existing_features.title: Update the Profile page success messaging (English) to clearly indicate that the uploaded display picture is saved to the user profile permanently and will remain available next time they sign in.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make uploaded profile photo permanent (persist/store the profile photo so it remains saved for the user profile)
